scripts.docker:build:dev: docker build -t virtual-scroll-app:dev --build-arg VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3000 --build-arg VITE_APP_NAME="MyApp Dev" --build-arg VITE_ENV=development .
scripts.docker:build:staging: docker build -t virtual-scroll-app:staging --build-arg VITE_API_URL=https://staging-api.example.com --build-arg VITE_APP_NAME="MyApp Staging" --build-arg VITE_ENV=staging .
scripts.docker:build:prod: docker build -t virtual-scroll-app:production --build-arg VITE_API_URL=https://api.example.com --build-arg VITE_APP_NAME="MyApp Production" --build-arg VITE_ENV=production .
